description: This veggie packed shepherd's pie is delicious topped with silky butterbean mash.
name: Vegetable Shepherd's Pie with Butterbean Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.4 cup vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the onions, celery and carrots for 6-8 minutes, stirring. Stir in the garlic, thyme, tomato puree and lentils and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in the wine and bubble for 1 minute. Stir in the stock, partially cover with the lid and simmer for 20-25 minutes until reduced.
Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Cook the potatoes in a large pot of boiling water for 6 minutes, stir in the beans and cook for 5 minutes, until tender. Drain well, mash and stir in the creme fraiche.
Pour the vegetable mix into an ovenproof dish, smooth the mash on top and bake for 30 minutes, until golden and bubbling.
